container.description: A series of tools designed to improve the reading of web pages in a dark environment/other.
container.titleContrast: Automatically adjust the graphical theme of the page to get the better possible contrast.
container.tileTheme: Select a color theme used by this function. A theme includes a background color, a text color and a link color unified for each web page.
container.previsualisationThemeText: A text. A link. A visited link.
container.disableImgBgColor: Color the background of the images
container.titleColorInvert: Invert the colors of the images, the videos and/or of the entire page to better stand out on the dark theme.
container.selectiveInvertHelp: Automatically invert certain elements so that they display correctly on a dark theme of the Increase page contrast feature. Based on the Filters functionality. Doesn't work when Invert entire page feature is enabled.
container.tileEntirePageInvert: Invert the colors of the entire page.
container.titleBrightness: Decrease the page brightness. You can choose the percentage of brightness decrease.
container.tileNightMode: Apply an orange filter on the page to reduce the blue light emitted by the screen.
container.titleAutoEnable: Enable or disable globally Page Shadow automatically according to the time. Select the cog wheel icon to setup this function.
container.liveSettings: Apply the settings in real time
container.titleTemp: Select the color temperature of the orange filter. The lower is the temperature, the more intense is the orange color of the filter. The temperature is in Kelvin.
container.presetAutoEnabledForThisWebsite: Preset nÂ°{{count}} automatically enabled for this website/page, overriding the settings below.
container.updatePresetSettings: Update the preset with current settings

modal.customThemeInfos: To setup this custom theme, you have to go to the Advanced settings of Page Shadow.

archive.restorePresetEmpty: Cannot load this preset because it is empty
archive.updatePresetError: An error has occurred when updating the preset
archive.createPresetError: An error has occurred when creating the preset

modalAutoEnable.description: Here you can set the hours of the automatic activation or deactivation of Page Shadow.
modalAutoEnable.saveInfo: Do not forget to click on Confirm to save your settings!
modalAutoEnable.infoTimeEnabled: According to the settings entered, Page Shadow should currently be activated.
modalAutoEnable.infoTimeDisabled: According to the settings entered, Page Shadow should currently be deactivated.

modalUpdated.title: Extension updated
modalUpdated.message: Page Shadow has just been updated to version {{version}} dated {{date}}!

createPresetModal.title: Create preset
createPresetModal.infoLead: The preset will be created with the current settings as displayed in this menu.
createPresetModal.infoAdvanced: More settings are available when creating/editing a preset in the Advanced settings
